scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start-prod
scripts.list: echo "Liste des plugins téléchargés :" && cd src/plugins && ls -l | grep ^d | awk '{print $9}'
scripts.update:
cd src/plugins && for plugin in $(cat ../files/plugins.list); do plugin_name=$(echo $plugin | cut -d'/' -f2); if [ -d "../plugins/$plugin_name" ]; then echo "\033[32m Plugin $plugin_name already downloaded !  \033[0m"; else git clone https://github.com/$plugin; echo "\033[32m Plugin $plugin added successfully ! \033[0m 
"; fi done && echo "
\033[32m Downloading updates... Please wait... \033[0m 
" && for folder in $(ls -l | grep ^d | awk '{print $9}'); do cd $folder; git pull -q; cd ..; if ! grep -oq $folder$ ../files/plugins.list; then rm -r $folder; echo "\033[32m Plugin $folder removed successfully ! \033[0m
"; fi done && cd ../.. && echo "\033[32m Plugins from files/plugins.list added/removed/updated successfully ! \033[0m 
"
scripts.rebase:
cd src/ && rm -r plugins && mkdir plugins && cd plugins && for plugin in $(cat ../files/plugins.list); do git clone https://github.com/$plugin; done && cd ../.. && echo "
\033[32m Successfully rebased from files/plugins.list ! \033[0m 
"
scripts.first:
cd src/ && mkdir plugins && cd plugins && for plugin in $(cat ../files/plugins.list); do git clone https://github.com/$plugin; done && cd ../.. && echo "
\033[32m Successfully installed from files/plugins.list ! \033[0m 
"
